subject: First subject line
content:
Thanks for signing up to my newsletter!

You’re awesome!

You’ll get daily emails of only the best tips and tricks on Affiliate Marketing, Building Your Online Brand and Entrepreneurship. If you’re lucky, you might even find a couple jokes in here.

My hope is that at least one of these emails will bridge the gap between you and your dreams.

Like Jim Rohn once said...

“Ideas can be life-changing. Sometimes all you need to open the door is just one more good idea.”

And on that note, here’s my first shameless tip for you…

If you haven’t already created your free account to My Online Startup...

You must create your Free Account today.

It’s a Free Course to learn affiliate marketing the right way. If I had to choose only one thing to recommend to you, this would be it.

You can create your Free Account here.

Once you create your account, you’ll get to join our members-only Facebook group with almost 80k members!

Can’t wait for you to connect, learn, laugh (and sometimes cry) with all of us!

See you inside!

Best of luck and talk soon,

{!global name}


P.S. I always try to share the hottest and newest products on traffic generation, conversions and ninja strategies to further help you build your business.

These recommendations will keep you in the loop of the trendiest methods that other marketers are using right now in their own online business.

Click here to check out these daily products.
